Package model

Class BasicInformation

java.lang.Object
model.BasicInformation
public class BasicInformation extends Object
The BasicInformation class represents the basic information of a person for a CV. It provides methods to save, retrieve, and delete the basic information. The information is stored in a JSON file along with an optional image file.

  • Constructor Details

    • BasicInformation

      public BasicInformation(String name, int age, String school, String major, String admission_time, String graduation_time)
      Constructs a BasicInformation object with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the person.
      age - The age of the person.
      school - The school attended by the person.
      major - The major of the person.
      admission_time - The admission time to the school.
      graduation_time - The graduation time from the school.

  • Method Details

    • setImagePath

      public void setImagePath(String path)
      Sets the image path for the BasicInformation object.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the image file.

    • getBasicInformation

      public static String getBasicInformation() throws URISyntaxException
      Retrieves the basic information from the JSON file.
      Returns:
      The basic information in JSON format.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the JSON file path is invalid.

    • path

      public String path() throws URISyntaxException
      Retrieves the file path of the JSON file containing the basic information.
      Returns:
      The file path of the JSON file.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the file path is invalid.

    • saveBasicInformation

      public String saveBasicInformation(File image)
      Saves the basic information and optional image file to the JSON and image files, respectively.
      Parameters:
      image - The image file to be saved.
      Returns:
      The relative path to the saved files.
      Throws:
      JSONException - If there is an error in creating the JSON object.

    • newSaveBasicInformation

      public String newSaveBasicInformation(int selection)
      Saves the basic information with a predefined image based on the selection.
      Parameters:
      selection - The selection number for the predefined image.
      Returns:
      The relative path to the saved image file.
      Throws:
      JSONException - If there is an error in creating the JSON object.

    • deleteBasicInformation

      public boolean deleteBasicInformation()
      Deletes the basic information and image files.
      Returns:
      true if the files are successfully deleted, false otherwise.
